sentences.en: A bit of charm and humour would not go amiss.
sentences.cn: 人有点吸引力和幽默感总是好的。

sentences.en: But underneath the humour is an edge of bitterness.
sentences.cn: 但是幽默的背后却透着怨气。

sentences.en: English humour
sentences.cn: 英国式幽默

sentences.en: Gillespie is well known for his impish sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 吉莱斯皮以他精灵搞怪的幽默感而广为人知。

sentences.en: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.cn: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.en: He had a terrific sense of humour and could be very amusing.
sentences.cn: 他极具幽默感，很会逗人发笑。

sentences.en: He had enormous charm and a great sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 他极富魅力而且非常有幽默感。

sentences.en: He has a lively sense of humour and appears naturally confident.
sentences.cn: 他有一种活泼外向的幽默感，看上去大方自信。

sentences.en: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.cn: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

sentences.en: his humour and charm
sentences.cn: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.en: His sense of humour allowed him to face adversaries with equanimity..
sentences.cn: .他的幽默感让他能够平静地面对对手。

sentences.en: Hugo bore his illness with great courage and good humour.
sentences.cn: 雨果以巨大的勇气和良好的精神状态面对疾病。

sentences.en: I can see you have a keen sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 我能看出你极具幽默感。

sentences.en: It was one of his rare attempts at humour.
sentences.cn: 那是他极不常见的想要表现幽默的一次。

sentences.en: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.cn: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.en: Sharon tells the story of that night with self-deprecating humour.
sentences.cn: 沙伦以幽默自嘲的口吻讲述那一夜的故事。

sentences.en: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.cn: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.en: There is a wry sense of humour in his work.
sentences.cn: 他的作品带有一种讽刺意味的幽默。

sentences.en: This book is suffused with Shaw's characteristic wry Irish humour.
sentences.cn: 这本书充满了萧伯纳独特的爱尔兰式幽默与嘲讽。

sentences.en: This comedy of contemporary manners is told with compassion and acid humour.
sentences.cn: 这部当代风尚喜剧杂糅了悲悯的情怀和尖酸的幽默。

sentences.en: This Spanish drama has a vein of black humour running through it.
sentences.cn: 这出西班牙戏剧自始至终都带有几分黑色幽默。

words.tran_cn: 非常严肃的；缺少幽默感的
诙谐的，幽默的；滑稽的，可笑的
缺乏幽默感的；一本正经的
缺乏幽默感地；一本正经地

trans.tran_cn: 幽默，心情，精神状态，体液
trans.tran_en: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset
